item.title: A* Tricks for Videogame Path Finding | Tim Mastny
item.description: Above I talked about using the pixels as nodes, but in a 2d tile based game, you can use the tiles as nodes. This speeds up the search dramatically, since the monster can find a path to the player in fewer iterations.
